title: React Developer Meetup 2025
description: Join fellow React developers for an evening of learning, networking, and sharing the latest trends in React development.
fullDescription: This meetup is perfect for both beginners and experienced React developers. We'll cover the latest features in React 18, discuss best practices, and have hands-on workshops. Network with like-minded developers and expand your knowledge in a collaborative environment.

title: Digital Marketing Summit
description: Learn cutting-edge digital marketing strategies from industry experts. Perfect for business owners and marketing professionals.
fullDescription: A comprehensive summit covering SEO, social media marketing, content strategy, and digital advertising. Features keynote speakers from leading tech companies and hands-on workshops to implement what you learn immediately.

title: Cultural Heritage Festival
description: Celebrate Pakistan's rich cultural heritage with traditional music, dance, art exhibitions, and local cuisine.
fullDescription: Experience the vibrant culture of Pakistan through traditional performances, art exhibitions, craft workshops, and delicious local food. This family-friendly event celebrates our diverse cultural heritage and brings communities together.

title: Gaming Tournament 2025
description: Epic gaming tournament featuring popular esports titles. Compete for prizes and glory in various gaming categories.
fullDescription: Join the ultimate gaming competition featuring FIFA, Call of Duty, and League of Legends tournaments. Open to all skill levels with separate amateur and professional categories. Great prizes and trophies await the winners!
